tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legal_data_analysis (
  case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255),
  lawyer_name VARCHAR(255),
  court_name VARCHAR(255),
  case_type VARCHAR(100),
  case_description TEXT,
  case_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE legal_cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255),
    case_type VARCHAR(50),
    lawyer_name VARCHAR(100),
    court_location VARCHAR(100),
    case_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE legal_entities (
    entity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    entity_name VARCHAR(255),
    entity_type VARCHAR(50),
    entity_address VARCHAR(255),
    entity_phone VARCHAR(15),
    entity_email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE case_details (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_title VARCHAR(255),
    case_description TEXT,
    filing_date DATE,
    case_type VARCHAR(50),
    jurisdiction VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE lawyer_details (
    lawyer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE legal_entities (
    entity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    entity_name VARCHAR(100),
    entity_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    industry VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE case_documents (
    doc_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id UUID REFERENCES case_details(case_id),
    document_name VARCHAR(100),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    uploader_id UUID REFERENCES lawyer_details(lawyer_id),
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE case_notes (
    note_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id UUID REFERENCES case_details(case_id),
    note_text TEXT,
    author_id UUID REFERENCES lawyer_details(lawyer_id),
    note_date TIMESTAMP
);
